root.name: Bakukyuu Renpatsu!! Super B-Daman Gekitan! Rising Valkyrie!
root.description: OverviewBakukyuu Renpatsu!! Super B-Daman Gekitan! Rising Valkyrie! is a Role-Playing game developed by Alpha Unit and published by TAKARA Co. for the Game Boy Color platform. Bakukyuu Renpatsu!! Super B-Daman Gekitan! Rising Valkyrie! was never released outside of Japan.
